name: DungeonSmash
description:
DungeonSmash is a simple and addictive game where you break blocks in medieval dungeons.

FEATURES



  • The level editor
  • Community levels
  • Tournaments and prizes for the best maps
  • 90+ Achievements
  • 40+ Levels

THE LEVEL EDITOR



  • Create your own levels
  • Play players maps
  • Receive ratings and prizes

Although the game is finished and fully playable, only the first level is available as we plan to release new levels in future free updates.
